problem_text_cn: 如图,铁道口的栏杆短臂OA长1.2m,长臂OB长19.2m．当长臂外端B升高8m时,短臂外端A下降()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the length of the short arm OA of the railing at the railway crossing is N_0, and the length of the long arm OB is N_1. When the outer end B of the long arm rises by N_2, the outer end A of the short arm drops ()
raw_answer:
解:设短臂外端A下降x米,
则\frac{8}{x}=\frac{19.2}{1.2},∴x=0.5．
故选:C．
raw_comment: 此题是相似三角形在实际生活中的运用,比较简单．
